NewsEntry.Title: Katrina Kaif Has Been Signed To Star In Dhoom 3
NewsEntry.Body: Bollywood actress Katrina Kaif has been signed to star in next installment of the action adventure series Dhoom 3, Dhoom III (2012) . The movie also includes Aamir Khan in a negative (anti hero) role. Yash Raj Films (YRF) was looking for a fresh face to follow in the role which was carried on by Esha Deol and Aishwarya Rai, in Dhoom and Dhoom 2, Back In Action (2006) , respectively. The movie will be directed by Vijay Krishna Acharya (Victor) with movie by Pritam . This will also be the first time Katrina Kaif and Aamir Khan be seen on screen together.

NewsEntry.Title: Giselle Monteiro On Cover Of Maxim India September 2011 Issue
NewsEntry.Body: Giselle Monteiro is being featured on the cover of September 2011 edition of Maxim India . The photos will be part of the Maxim India September 2011 edition.

NewsEntry.Title: Shahid Kapoor To Play Three Roles in One Film
NewsEntry.Body: Shahid Kapoor will be playing three roles in his upcoming movie Teri Meri Kahaani (2011). This will also bring him back with actress Priyanka Chopra with whom he last starred opposite in Kaminay (2009) back in 2009.

NewsEntry.Title: Jacqueline Fernandez On Cover Of Maxim India June 2011 Issue
NewsEntry.Body: Jacqueline Fernandez is being featured on the cover of June 2011 edition of Maxim India . The photos will be part of the Maxim India June 2011 edition.
